PosType.description: This is a definition of the POS settings.

priceVerification.description: Displays price verification button in PLU and item search, only for countries that do not require a control transaction for that.

ServerType.description: This is a definition of the server settings.

networkCallTimeout.description: The timeout for network calls. In milliseconds.

enableEdge.description: Allows the application to switch to the Edge solution offline.

LayoutType.description: This is a definition of the layout properties settings.

logoUri.description: URI for logo in SCO mode.

theme.description: Theme object for customisation of the app.

itemPictureFlag.description: Enables showing of item images in receipt and search.

fullscreen.description: Sets whether the application should open in full screen by default.

kiosk.description: Hides the settings button from drawer.

PeripheralsType.description: This is a definition of the peripherals properties settings.

ScannerType.description: This is a definition of the scanner settings.

PrinterType.description: This is a definition of the printer settings.

LockType.description: This is a definition of the lock settings.

timeout.description: The number of seconds the register is idle before it is autolocked.

ReceiptType.description: This is a definition of the receipt settings.

enableInfoReceipt.description: Enables the new receipt rendering based on the info property data.

clearReceiptTimeout.description: The number of seconds the receipt is visible after finalization. In milliseconds.

IntegratedWebBrowserType.description: This is a definition of the integrated web browser settings.

VariantSearchType.description: This is a definition of the variant search settings.

PromptType.description: This is a definition of the prompt settings.

integerMonetary.description: Indicates if the monetary input should accept decimals or not.

ScoType.description: This is a definition of the SCO settings.

disableDecreaseFlag.description: Allows for item's quantity decrease in SCO mode.

sessionKeepAliveInterval.description: Defines the session keep alive interval in SCO mode. To be set in milliseconds.

scoLoyaltyCCPrefix.description: Defines the loyalty card prefix in SCO mode.

ScoLanguageType.description: This is a definition language settings in SCO mode.

availableLanguages.description: Defines the available languages in SCO mode. Comma separated i.e en-GB,sv-SE.

defaultLanguage.description: Defines the default languages in SCO mode.

ScoPluType.description: This is a definition of the PLU settings in SCO mode.

enabled.description: Enables the plu in SCO mode.

ScoBagsType.description: This is a definition of the bags settings in SCO mode.

enabled.description: Enables the bags screen in SCO mode.

paperBag.description: Defines the EAN and the name of the paper bag in SCO mode.

plasticBag.description: Defines the EAN and the name of the plastic bag in SCO mode.

ScoBagType.description: This is a definition of the bag.

ean.description: Defines the EAN of the bag.

title.description: Defines the name of the bag.

ScoAssistanceType.description: This is a definition assistance settings in SCO mode.

enableCallAssistant.description: Enables the call assistant button in SCO mode.

CfdType.description: This is a definition of the cfd settings.

autoStart.description: Enables auto start of customer faced display.

welcomeMessage.description: Welcome message to display on the customer facing display.
